extendedInfo.description: Super Hexagon is a minimal action game by Terry Cavanagh, with music by Chipzel.REVIEWS:-----------------"A masterpiece of design purity." - EDGE, 9/10"This is the kind of game youâre going to pass off to your friends and say, 'Youâve gotta check this out.' Itâs dangerously addictive." - IGN, 9/10"Knows exactly what type of game it wants to be and executes on it spectacularly. Merciless difficulty meets brilliant design." - Gamezebo, 5/5

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: It really doesn\'t cheat you. It\'s so simple in its rules and presentation, but so complex and replayable.
reviews.author: Ian Hurtt

reviews.title: Excellent on cm10
reviews.comment: Input lag resolved with latest update!     I love this game on my sgs3 with cm10. With that said, I am having issues with input lag on stock Samsung roms.  I\'m leaving it at five stars because it\'s still amazing and the best game I have ever purchased.
reviews.author: Angus Warren

reviews.title: GPS
reviews.comment: Game is great, have it both on my PC and on my Android devices. I just hope TC and/or the porting team integrates the Google Play Game Services leaderboards, works so much better than ScoreLoop.
reviews.author: Dakota Reynolds

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Tests your reflexes... You better get used to hearing the words \"game over\" a lot! Very fun game
reviews.author: Daniel Lineberger

reviews.title: Best game yet
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried many of the Android games and this is the first that I\'m truly impressed with. I\'ve tried all of the modern combats, nova, asphalt, etc. And I typically end up deleting them. But this is truly top notch quality stuff here and very original. Thanks!
reviews.author: Bryant Allred

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Superb skill based game. Pumping beats, lightning fast restarts. Dark Souls for the time poor!
reviews.author: Adam Woodcock

reviews.title: Super addicting, pick up and play
reviews.comment: This game offers quick fun game play that has kept me coming back daily.  Mobile games should be bite sized in this busy world, and this offers just that!
reviews.author: mike liu

reviews.title: BUG AND LAGGING
reviews.comment: Now every time it says line, triangle,etc the game lags. It\'s one of the reasons I can only last 10 seconds on the 3rd level. Now the bug,sometimes when i crash with a obstacle the little triangle goes through the obstacle,and that\'s how i sometimes die. I like it a lot,but the only problem is the lagging and the bug. May you please fix this. Is on a DROID RAZR.
reviews.author: Jhonathan Camargo

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Awesome game! Great music! You need no drugs anymore if you play this game ;) It\'s very hard, but that\'s good and makes it so addictive. *self-promotion* If you like this game you may also like \"Scribble Racer\" ;-)
reviews.author: Wolfgang Knecht

reviews.title: Great. But lacking...
reviews.comment: I really like this game because it is ahallenging, but I feel like the unlocked modes are impossibe to beat. Also it would be nice if they used the same concept and created something really fun.
reviews.author: Devin Hughley

reviews.title: One of the best games on Android
reviews.comment: This game is awesome.  The more you play it, the better you become, and the further you can go in the game. I\'ve played this game for a couple of weeks now, and I\'m still breaking my records.
reviews.author: Mads R\303\270nnow

reviews.title: Best money spent on a game
reviews.comment: I can\'t stop playing this. Very bad for social relations, but who cares: super hexagoooonnnn
reviews.author: Yan Niznik

reviews.title: Hard as crap
reviews.comment: This game is fun and takes tons of practice u will hear game over every 10seconds when u start haha.. do wish it had more easier levels tho but it\'s a def buy for only 2-3 bucks!
reviews.author: Kyle Parks

reviews.title: Needs mute option
reviews.comment: Simplistic and very hard - this game is awesome. Beat 2/6 of the game in 3 months. After playing too much, music starts to get annoying,  and I wish I could mute the game to listen to my own songs.
reviews.author: Yuri Furusho Becker

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: Worked great on my Nexus 7 even before the update, along with my SGS3. Unreasonably addicting. Great game. Well worth Tue cost.
reviews.author: Brandon Tizol

reviews.title: Great!!!  even better than pc version!!!!
reviews.comment: MASTERPIECE!!! It\'s very difficult, but the controls are very slick and the levels are perfectly designed!! Kudos to Terry Cavanagh!
reviews.author: Tiago Zanatta Furlanetto

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is the greatest game ever made for phone/small tablets IMO.  A game of epic proportions that stands tall in my mind with games like galaga/super mario bros/Zelda ect. Thanks for getting this over to the android community Terry, it was great for iOS but better on my gs3. You nailed it man...
reviews.author: Jacob Broo

reviews.title: It\'s sort of fun.
reviews.comment: Frustrating when you die because the next line isn\'t visible until it\'s too late. Some angles do that. Game is mostly about becoming comfortable with the controls, which are super sensitive. If 1 press moved you to the next grid it would be way easier, because you wouldn\'t go past the openings as much.
reviews.author: Peter Bailey

reviews.title: Psychedelic fast-paced game
reviews.comment: Stunning game with fantastic soundtrack and amazing visual. Highly addictive and challenging.
reviews.author: Gabriel Andrade

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Fun, addictive, And insanely hard. Whoever thought up this game is sick and twisted. If you like this try infinite.
reviews.author: jason crighton
